tgt_text: Phresidennde vho ranga phanḓa vhurumelwa vhu bvaho kha masia mararu muvhuso nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “A hu Tei vha na Tsaleli”.

src_text: The Imbizo was preceded by the President’s visit to the nearby Vlakkeland Catalytic Human Settlement Development, which is the largest public housing development to date in the Drakenstein Local Municipality.
tgt_text: Mveledziso ye ya thomiwa nga ṅwaha wa 2017 dzi ḓo ri musi dzi tshi khunyeledzwa, dza ṋetshedza madzulo swikala 2 556 kha vhathu vho teaho vhane vha tea vhuelwa.

src_text: The development that commenced in 2017 will upon completion provide 2 556 houses to qualifying beneficiaries.

tgt_text: Zwa fhaṱwa ha nnḓu dzi swikaho 942 kha Luṱa lwa Thoma zwazwino zwi kati, lune ho no khunyeledzwa dziṅwe dzi swikaho 454 ngeno dziṅwe dza 301 hu hone dzi tshi kha ḓi vha kati na fhaṱiwa.

src_text: The construction of 942 houses in the First Phase is underway, with 454 completed and 301 under construction.

src_text: Social Security Award.
tgt_text: Shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ḽo ṱanganedza Pfufho ya Maitele Avhuḓi ya Dzangano ḽa Magavhelo zwa Matshilisano ḽa Dzitshaka (ISSA) kha zwa Magavhelo zwa Matshilisano Afrika kha ṅwaha wa 2023, ḽine ḽa dzhiela nṱha vhubindudzi ha muvhuso kha matshilo vhana vhashu, nga maanḓa avho vhane vha bva kha miṱa yo shayaho nahone songo tsireledzeaho.

src_text: South Africa has received the prestigious International Social Security Association (ISSA) Good Practice Award in Social Security for Africa 2023, which recognises government’s investment in the lives of our children, especially those from poor and vulnerable households.

tgt_text: The draft Bill aims to amend the National Small Enterprise Act (Act 102 of 1996) and provides for the establishment and registration of the Office of Small Enterprise Ombud Service.

src_text: It broadens fair processes for small enterprises through the Ombud Service, which will be tasked with considering and disposing of complaints by small enterprises.
tgt_text: It broadens fair processes for small enterprises through the Ombud Service, which will be tasked with considering and disposing of complaints by small enterprises.

src_text: Implementation of the amendments will realise greater stability to the sector and advance economic opportunity through the creation of job opportunities by small, medium and micro enterprises.
tgt_text: Implementation of the amendments will realise greater stability to the sector and advance economic opportunity through the creation of job opportunities by small, medium and micro enterprises.

src_text: In addition to the setting up of the Office; the amendments also include the appointment of Ombud and Deputy Ombud; allocation of powers and functions of Ombud; receipt of complaints, prescription, jurisdiction and investigation; determinations by Ombud; staff of office; delegation by Ombud, Deputy Ombud and Director
